ingredients: +   1/4 cup butter,   +   1/2 cup packed light brown sugar,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 5  fresh peaches - peeled, pitted and halved,   +   1/2 cup butter, softened,   +   1/2 cup white sugar, 1  egg, 1   +   1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/2 cup milk
